data.title: NU FLOW
data.text:
Song Information

Artist: BIG BROVAZ

Composition/Lyrics: Big Brovaz, Dion Howell

Arrangement/Producers: Skillz and Fingaz

Vocals: Big Brovaz

Album: Nu-Flow (2002)

BPM: 148

Length: 1:46

First Music Game Appearance: Dancing Stage Unleashed

Other Music Game Appearances: None.

Lyrics

Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls It is my pleasure to introduce to you all The finest, the brightest The meanest, the strongest The very best of them all The south London collective group, known as- For goodness sake Roger, who is it? This is Big Bro, Bro Taking over the show, show With this new flow, flow You need to listen up And feel this shhh 'Cause we won't quit, quit We make them hits And stack them chips Who's this? Hey yo, this is J-Rock And I've got more skills than average Put us together man We're more than all of y'all can manage 'Cause we be the baddest at it This hit took years of practice And now we're showing more Money and its more madness Stack up on a daily basis We've traveled so many places Switching so many chicks We're mixing up the names with faces They see the ice and they trip They like to ride in the whip But all I wanna know is If these girls is riding the- ahh! Who's, who's, who's this? This is the N.A.D.I. Ya didn't think I was coming at ya Giving you people a different Kind of big brother flava I bet y'all didn't think I be Riding these beats and making the paper But I guess that I'm a paper chaser playa And its in my nature This is Big Bro, Bro Taking over the show, show With this new flow, flow You need to listen up And feel this shhh 'Cause we won't quit, quit We make them hits And stack them chips Who's this? Uh-huh, uh-huh, uh-huh Uh-huh, uh-huh, uh-huh Who's, who's this?

Song Connections / Remixes

None.

Trivia

Despite being a song in shuffle (12th) time, NU FLOW's charts use standard (16th) time notes.

NU FLOW's graphics were created by Takahiro Nakajima.

An unused set of charts for NU FLOW can be found within the Dancing Stage Unleashed data.

NU FLOW also appears on F2 System's dancing game EZ2Dancer UK Move Special Edition.

Song Production Information

None.

Difficulty & Notecounts

DanceDanceRevolution difficulty rated from 1 to 10 from DDRMAX2 to SuperNOVA2.

Original Charts
